clinical_history: Follow-up PET-CT after chemotherapy to assess treatment response.
findings: Focal increased uptake in pelvis, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in pelvis, suggestive of malignancy.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
recommendations: Correlate with MRI/CT for precise anatomical localization.
